result.execSummary:
The defendant Agustin M Ortiz Bernal was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Child Abuse-Intentionally Cause Harm, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.03(2)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes:
Pay court costs.   **NOTE: THE DEFENDANT IS ORDERED TO PAY ALL COURT OBLIGATIONS TO THE CLERK OF COURTS OFFICE.   Payment is due within 30 days.  If the Defendant cannot make the payment, he/she must report to the Clerk of Courts Office to set up a payment plan.  Failure to comply will result in other collection methods including a civil Judgment and/or suspension of your drivers license for two (2) years.  This judgment may be collected by income assignment if you fail to pay fines and costs as ordered.
-------------------------------

Follow all rules of the Department of Health and Human Services and orders of the family court.
-------------------------------
Counseling as recommended by Probation Agent. 
------------------------------- 
Provide biological specimen to state crime lab for DNA analysis, and pay DNA analysis surcharge.   
-------------------------------
The defendant must pay Department of Corrections Supervision fees.
-------------------------------

records.addlTxt: Defendant Agustin M Ortiz Bernal in court with attorney James B. Duquette.  Andrew Robert Herrmann appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Minutes filed.

ADDRESS INFO for Agustin M Ortiz Bernal
Current: 830 Washington St, Woodstock, IL 60098   (Effective: 12-02-2015)
Prior: 510 Leah Lane Apt 1B, Woodstock, IL 60098

Defendant Agustin M Ortiz Bernal in court with attorney James B. Duquette.  Matthew W. Surridge appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Minutes filed.  Final pre-trial scheduled for June 2, 2016 at 02:30 pm.  Jury trial - 12 person scheduled for June 6, 2016 at 08:30 am.
Plaintiff's Demand and Motion for Discovery and Inspection.  Notice of Motion and Motion for Establishment of Discovery Deadlines.
Not guilty plea and trial reserved. Motion deadline prior to status hearing on February 25, 2016.

Defendant Agustin M Ortiz Bernal in court with attorney James B. Duquette.  Valerian A Powell appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Matter before the Court for preliminary hearing, but defendant wishes to waive. Court goes over waiver form with the defendant. Attorney Duquette informs the Court that there is an agreement with the State that if the defendant waives his preliminary hearing, the State will not recommend prison at time of sentencing. Attorney Powell makes a record of victim notification. Information filed - reading waived. Minutes filed.  Status conference scheduled for February 25, 2016 at 01:15 pm.

records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt: Defendant Agustin M Ortiz Bernal in court with attorney James B. Duquette.  Daniel A. Necci appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Preliminary Hearing requested, time period waived. Minutes filed.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for December 21, 2015 at 02:00 pm.
Signed bond filed with the court.

Defendant will not in any way contact or attempt to contact any victim(s) listed and will avoid their residence/place of employment or any place they are located and will avoid causing any other person, other than defendant's attorney, from doing so on defendant's behalf.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as through the mail, by telephone, by way of electronic device, in person, or through a third party.  VICTIM(S)/RESIDENCE(S): NO CONTACT WITH X.H. OR J.O. OR THEIR RESIDENCE.   Defendant shall personally ensure that payments are made under any Order for Income Withholding if the Court appoints an attorney for the defendant.

15-4614
Defendant Augustin Ortiz Bernal present in court, in custody via video with attorney Julia May for bond purposes only. Valerian Powell appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Minutes filed.
